text: Twaranayihishuye (Qur’an) kugira ngo ukuri (kuganze ku isi), kandi twanayihishuye mu kuri. Ndetse nta kindi cyatumye tukohereza (yewe Muhamadi) bitari ukugira ngo utange inkuru nziza (yo kuzagororerwa ijuru ku bazakurikira ubutumwa bwawe) ukaba n’umuburizi (uburira abazahakana ubutumwa bwawe ko bazahanishwa igihano cy’umuriro)
